detaileddescription.para: This method returns whether an entity in the current AoI is being withheld from the client. This is modified with Witness::withholdFromClient.
This method modifies whether an entity is being sent to a client with detailed volatile position updates.

simplesect.para: On failure, the Python exception state is set and false is returned.

detaileddescription.para: This method returns whether an entity in the current AoI is being sent to the client with detailed position. This is modified with Witness::setDetailedPosition.
This method sets the AoI update scheme for a specific entity in our AoI.
This method gets the AoI update scheme for a specific entity in our AoI.
This static helper function will find an entity from the input Python object. This object may be the entity or the entity's id.

parameterdescription.para: An entity or an entity id.

simplesect.para: If the entity could not be found, NULL is returned and the Python exception state set.

detaileddescription.para: This method reads the relevant data from the stream to restore a Witness on a new cell.

parameterdescription.para: The input stream to restore from.
Enumeration to indicate how the reference position should be initialised.
Boolean indicating whether the space changed during the offload process.

detaileddescription.para: This method write the def space data information to a stream for offloading.

parameterdescription.para: The stream to write the space data to.

detaileddescription.para: This method reads the def space data when being onloaded to a new Cell.

parameterdescription.para: The input stream to read the space data from.
Boolean indicating whether the witness has changed space since being offloaded.

detaileddescription.para: This method write the def space data information to a stream for offloading.

parameterdescription.para: The stream to write the space data to.

detaileddescription.para: This method reads the def space data when being onloaded to a new Cell.

parameterdescription.para: The input stream to read the space data from.
Boolean indicating whether the witness has changed space since being offloaded.

detaileddescription.para: This method reads the AoI from the stream to initialise the Witness.

parameterdescription.para: The input stream containing the AoI initialise from.

detaileddescription.para: This method writes the AoI from the Witness to a stream to be used in onloading.

parameterdescription.para: The output stream to write the witness' AoI to.

detaileddescription.para: This method initialises this object some more. It is only separate from the constructor for historical reasons.
This method modifies whether an entity is withheld from being sent to a client.

simplesect.para: On failure, the Python exception state is set and false is returned.

detaileddescription.para: This method implements the Entity.isInAoI script method.

This method replaces our AoITrigger instance with one centred around the given RangeListNode, and returns the centre of the previous AoITrigger. It attempts to ensure that the onEnteredAoI and onLeftAoI callbacks only trigger where necessary.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the RangeListNode to centre our AoITrigger on

simplesect.para: A pointer to the RangeListNode the old AoITrigger was centred on

detaileddescription.para: This method adds the input entity to the collection of seen entities. It is called by addToAoI, or later in requestEntityUpdate.
This method removes the entity pointed to by the input iterator from this object's seen collection. It calls onLeaveAoI.

parameterdescription.para: The bundle to put the leaveAoI message on.
An iterator pointing to the entity cache of the entity being removed.
This is the id of the entity. This should only be passed in if the entity in the cache is NULL. This can occur when an entity is offloaded and a referenced entity is not on the new cell.

detaileddescription.para: This method informs the client that an entity has left its AoI.
This method removes and deletes an EntityCache from the AoI.
This handles the sending of an ENTER_PENDING EntityCache, and its removal from the entity queue.
This method sends the enterAoI message to the client.
This method sends the createEntity message to the client.
This method does the work that needs to be done when an entity leaves this entity's Area of Interest.
This method returns true if we have rooted our RangeListNode somewhere. If true, pAoIRoot() is an EntityRangeListNode. If false, pAoIRoot() is a MobileRangeListNode.
This method returns a reference to the next outgoing bundle destined for the proxy.
This method allocates a new id alias for the input entity. It may allocate NO_ID_ALIAS.
This method adds any appropriate changes to space property to a bundle.
This method adds space geometry mappings to a bundle.
This method adds the appropriate reference position message to the input bundle.

parameterdescription.para: The bundle to put the information on.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the boolean making the reference position message reliable, or NULL if no such message was added.

detaileddescription.para: This method converts the entity's position into a reference position. This just adjusts the position to be aligned to a larger grid so that calculated positions do not move around as the reference position changes.
This method adds a detailed volatile position message for the entity of this witness.

parameterdescription.para: The bundle to put the information on.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the boolean making the detailed volatile position message reliable, or NULL if no such message was added.

detaileddescription.para: This method processes an entity cache state change

parameterdescription.para: The current entity cache. Can be NULL after the call if it was invalidated.
Iterator pointing to the last entry in the heap

detaileddescription.para: This method writes client update data to bundle

parameterdescription.para: The current entity cache

simplesect.para: True if a reliable position update message was included in the bundle, false otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: This method writes a message to the given bundle indicating which entity the following history events are destined for.

parameterdescription.para: The bundle to put the information on.
The EntityCache for the Entity to select

simplesect.para: True unless the Entity was not in AoI or could not receive history events.

detaileddescription.para: This helper method returns the EntityCache associated with the given Python object. This may be an entity or an entity id.

simplesect.para: On failure, the Python exception state is set and NULL returned.

detaileddescription.para:
This method constructs a Python list of entities within AoI that satisfy the predicate.
predicate
A functor to test which entities should be added to the list (
AoICollector).
Python list of entities.
This method returns a Python list containing entities from this Witness' AoI.
This method determines whether we should be adding AoI updates for replay.
This method returns aoiRoot if available or entity_.position() otherwise as updatePriority origin for X and Z. The Update Priority calculation ignores the Y value.

This method checks if aoiSubsystem is a valid AoI subsystem index. A Python exception is raised if the index is out range.
aoiSubsystem
AoI subsystem index.
errMsg
An error message describing the requested operation.
true is valid.
This method should put the relevant data into the input BinaryOStream so that this entity can be onloaded to another cell.

parameterdescription.para: The stream to place the data on.

detaileddescription.para: This method adds the backup data associated with this real entity to the input stream.

memberdef.argsstring: (EntityID entityID, Mercury::MessageID msgID, MemoryOStream &stream, int msgSize)
memberdef.name: sendToClient

detaileddescription.para: This helper method is used to send data to the client associated with this object.
This helper method is used to send data to the proxy associated with this object.
This method sends the bundle to the client associated with this entity.
This virtual method is used to adjust the amount of data that is sent to a particular witness.
This virtual method is used to handle a request from the client to update the information associated with a particular entity.

This method adds the input entity to this entity's Area of Interest.
pEntity
Entity to be added.
aoiSubsystem
Index of the AoI subsystem to add the entity to.
This method removes the input entity from this entity's Area of Interest.

It is not actually removed immediately. This method is called when an AoI trigger is untriggered. It adds this to a leftAoI set and the normal priority queue updating is used to actually remove it from the list.

parameterdescription.para: Entity to be removed.
Index of the AoI subsystem to remove the entity from.

detaileddescription.para: This method informs us that our entity is now at a new position. We may use this opportunity to update our velocity record. and check if we're making too much noise.

This method updates the position reference based on a client update. When sending volatile entity positions to the client, the positions are sent as 12-bits floats (in x and z) and are relative to this position reference point.

parameterdescription.para: The sequence number associated with this reference position.

detaileddescription.para: This method cancels the position reference. When sending volatile entity positions to the client, the positions are sent as 3 bytes (one uint8 for each of x, y and z), and are relative to this position reference point. The position space thus is described as a 256m3 cube.
This method dumps this entity's AoI.
This method is used to dump debug information.
This method is called regularly to send data to the witnesses associated with this entity.
This method is called when our client has just been sent a reliable detailed position for our entity.
This method sets our AoI root to the given X,Z position in the world.
This method sets our AoI root to be our entity
This method returns our current AoIRoot as a PyObject *
This method sets our current AoIRoot from a PyObject * Acceptable inputs are this entity, a 2-tuple of X,Z or a 3-tuple of X,Y,Z where Y is ignored.
This method sets the aoiRootIsReferencePosition flag.
Python getter for Entity.bpsToClient
Python setter for Entity.bpsToClient

detaileddescription.para: This method lets the client know the server's view of which vehicle it is on.
This method is used to visit entities in the AoI.

parameterdescription.para: The visitor.

detaileddescription.para: Streaming operator for EntityCache.
Streaming operator for EntityCache.

This class is a witness to the movements and perceptions of a RealEntity. It is created when a client is attached to this entity. Its main activity centres around the management of an Area of Interest list.
